item.description:
Hi Packers,

We are after having a rough couple of weeks, losing Monday Night Football, just getting over Detroit and beaten by Washington, the Pack needâ€™s a win against Miami this Sunday. We will be meeting at The Banshee on the 2nd floor for 1pm, the 2nd floor will be open at 12pm for all the early birds. Raddeberger will be $3 as usual (sorry for running out last week, plenty in stock now), and thank you for all who turned out last week. We have 34 names for our tail gate party on December 19th, buses are being booked this week, if you want to go please get your name to me, food and drink complements of Radeberger. As usual all feed back welcome.

Best,

Packers Boston

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay v Miami
